snippet: Gidon Kremer, the violinist who organized the concert “To Russia With Love,” hoped it would be followed in Russia and inspire those who are struggling there against the recent crackdown on human rights.
abstract: Gidon Kremer, the violinist who organized the concert “To Russia With Love,” hoped it would be followed in Russia and inspire those who are struggling there against the recent crackdown on human rights.

headline.main: In Berlin, Musical Support for Rights in Russia
headline.print_headline: Concert Offers Russia Some Tough Love
